name: Mote Memory Management
description: Search, add, and manage agent memories. Use this skill to store important information, retrieve context, or manage the agent's knowledge base.
author: mote

tools.name: mote_memory_search
tools.description: Search for memories using semantic similarity. Returns relevant memories based on the query.

query.description: The search query to find relevant memories

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

categories.description: Filter by categories: preference, fact, decision, entity, other

tools.name: mote_memory_add
tools.description: Add a new memory entry to the agent's memory store. Use this to save important information for later retrieval.

content.description: The content to store as a memory

source.description: The source of the memory (manual, conversation, document, tool). Default: manual

category.description: Category: preference, fact, decision, entity, other. Auto-detected if not provided.

tools.name: mote_memory_list
tools.description: List recent memories from the agent's memory store

limit.description: Maximum number of memories to return (default: 20)

tools.name: mote_memory_get
tools.description: Get a specific memory entry by ID. Use this after search to retrieve the full content of a memory.

id.description: The ID of the memory to retrieve

tools.name: mote_memory_delete
tools.description: Delete a specific memory by ID

id.description: The ID of the memory to delete

tools.name: mote_memory_sync
tools.description: Synchronize memories with external markdown storage. This ensures memories are persisted and backed up.

tools.name: mote_memory_daily
tools.description: Get or add to the daily memory log. Use GET mode to view today's log, or POST mode to append a new entry.

content.description: Content to append to daily log (if provided, will POST; otherwise will GET)

tools.name: mote_memory_export
tools.description: Export all memories in a portable format (JSON). Useful for backup or migration.

tools.name: mote_memory_import
tools.description: Import memories from a JSON payload. Useful for restoring backups or migrating data.

data.description: JSON string containing memories to import

tools.name: mote_memory_stats
tools.description: Get memory statistics including total count, counts by category, counts by capture method, and today's auto-capture/recall counts.
